title: How to know love is coming my way? What are the spiritual signs - Quora

response.answer_text: TIME TO MEET THE ONE Only God knows the answer. But generally, when love is coming your way, God might make changes in at least one area of your life. For example you can feel a need to take cooking courses or to take care of yourself more than you would do generally or a need to become more patient. Those kind of signs. By the way, I'm not an expert in this but I found two nice videos that can help you. Three signs showing that God is preparing you for marriage Time to meet your husband And I strongly encourage you to pray about that and ask God to make you identify the person he has chosen for you.
You will smile a lot.You will be happier.You will get jealous too often for no reason.You will find time to meet them, no matter how busy you are.Their happiness is your first priority.
